description: This file defines the React component 'AnimalsPage', which manages the CRUD interface for animal data, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting animals, using modals for user interactions and integrating with an AnimalsAPI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of animals from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: startCreate
methods.description: Prepares the form for creating a new animal and opens the modal.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Prepares the form for editing an existing animal and opens the modal.

methods.name: doDelete
methods.description: Deletes the specified animal after user confirmation and reloads the list.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Submits the form data to create or update an animal via the API.
